events.message: I recently ordered a jacket from your website but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit well and doesn't match the description.
The case was reviewed and categorized as a Refund request due to customer's desire to return the product.
The refund request case has been assigned to an agent specialized in returns and refunds for further processing.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so that I can start the refund process for you?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is too tight and the color looks different from the pictures online.

Thank you for the details. I have initiated your return request, and you will receive a prepaid shipping label shortly. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate your quick help with this matter.
I’m glad I could assist you. Your case is now processed, and please check your email for the shipping label to return the jacket.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to send back the jacket and if you need any additional assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday via the prepaid label and I’m looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been successfully issued. Thank you for your patience, and let us know if you need any further help in the future.
We’ve sent a short survey to get your feedback on how we handled your refund request. We appreciate your time in helping us improve.
